titles: A salutation of dear and tender love to the seed of God arising in Aberdeen in two epistles : directed unto friends of truth in that place whom the Lord hath called ... to bear their testimony for his glorious truth (against an evil, adulterous, and persecuting generation) ... / writ by George Keith.
author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Society of Friends --  Pastoral letters and charges.
